SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT574IRSLST
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
The appropriate format validation of the IRS Beneficial Owners' List of the MT 574 IRS 1441 NRA is triggered by the code IRSLST in field 119 ({3:{119:IRSLST}}) of the user header of the message (block 3). IRS Beneficial Owners' List : Scope This message is sent by a Non-Qualified Intermediary (NQI) to its Withholding Agent or by a Qualifier Intermediary to its US Custodian at the beginning of the year or prior to a payment of a reportable amount.
This message is used as an income report to provide owner or pooled income information for a period of time arranged between the intermediary and the withholding agent.
More generally, this message can be sent to provide beneficial owner information required to process withholding tax reclaims and applications for relief at source.
This message may also be used to:
a) request the cancellation of a previously sent IRS Beneficial Owners' List.
b) replace a previously sent IRS Beneficial Owners' List if a change in circumstances makes any information about the IRS Beneficial Owners' List you have submitted incorrect.

Validation.Comment: Continuation Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T97) :

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: Last page of a statement with more than one page.

Code.Name: MORE
Code.Description: Intermediate page of a statement which contains additional pages.

Code.Name: ONLY
Code.Description: Only page of the statement.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Code.Name: REPL
Code.Description: Message replacing a previously sent message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Flag must contain the following code (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: This message represents a beneficial owner list.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: This message represents an income report.

Validation.Comment: Flag must contain the following code (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier)(Data Source Scheme)(Type of ID)(Country Code)(Alternate ID)

Validation.Comment: Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .

Name (Format Option T) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
In option S, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: EINX
Code.Description: Number assigned to an employer.

Code.Name: FTIN
Code.Description: Foreign tax identification number.

Code.Name: ITIN
Code.Description: IRS individual taxpayer identification number.

Code.Name: QEIN
Code.Description: Qualified Intermediary's employer identification number.

Code.Name: SSNX
Code.Description: Number assigned to an individual by a social security agency.

Validation.Comment: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is ETYP and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Description: Income effectively connected with a U.S. trade or business.
Exempt under an Internal Revenue Code section (income other than portfolio interest).
Income is not from U.S. sources.
Exempt under tax treaty.
Portfolio interest exempt under an Internal Revenue Code section.
Qualified Intermediary that assumes primary withholding responsibility.
Withholding foreign partnership.
U.S. branch treated as a U.S. person.
Qualified Intermediary represents income is exempt.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is ITYP and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Description: Interest paid by U.S. obligors - general.
Interest on real property mortgages.
Interest paid to controlling foreign corporations.
Interest paid by foreign corporations.
Interest on tax-free covenant bonds.
Dividends paid by U.S. corporations - general
Dividends paid by U.S. subsidiaries to foreign parent corporations (including consent dividends).
Dividends paid by foreign corporations.
Capital gains.
Industrial royalties.
Motion picture or television copyright royalties.
Other royalties (eg, copyright, recording, publishing).
Real property income and natural resources royalties.
Pensions, annuities, alimony, and/or insurance premiums.
Scholarship or fellowship grants.
Compensation for independent personal services.
Compensation for dependent personal services.
Compensation for teaching.
Compensation during studying and training.
Earnings as an artist or athlete.
Real estate investment trust (REI) distributions of capital gains.
Trust distributions subject to IRC section 1445.
Unsevered growing crops and timber distributions by a trust subject to IRC section 1445.
Publicly traded partnership distributions subject to IRC section 1445.
Gambling winnings.
Deposit interest.
Original issue discount (OID).
Short OID.
Notional principal contract income.
Other income.

Validation.Comment: Sign must not be present when Rate is '0' (Error code(s): T14).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U08
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid syntax, format, code word in tag 119(Validation Flag), or field tag 119 is missing. Allowed value is IRSLST."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-22F-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-22F-A If Qualifier is ACCL and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator must contain one of the following codes - FBEN, FBRA, FELT, FIMY, USEX, USNX
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Qualifier is ACCL and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator code must be one of FBEN, FBRA, FELT, FIMY, USEX, USNX"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-22F-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-22F-A If Qualifier is DOCT and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator must contain one of the following codes - OTHR, W8BE, W8EC, W8EX, W8IM, W9US
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Qualifier is DOCT and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator code must be one of OTHR, W8BE, W8EC, W8EX, W8IM, W9US"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-22F-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-22F-A If Qualifier is RECT and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator must contain one of the following codes - 0001, 0002, 0003, 0004, 0005, 0006, 0007, 0008, 0009, 0010, 0011, 0012, 0013, 0014, 0015, 0020
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Qualifier is RECT and Data Source Scheme is IRSX, Indicator code must be one of 0001, 0002, 0003, 0004, 0005, 0006, 0007, 0008, 0009, 0010, 0011, 0012, 0013, 0014, 0015, 0020"
